summary: Add a wearable Santa Hat for male in skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][/size][/center]
Description:
Simple and quick adaptation for male of the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60524/?]Christmas Catsuit Armor for UNP[/url] hat original meshes.

Note:
In DragonsReach you will find a barrel with in 1000 Santa Hats. :)

Know Issue:
Clipping with some hairstyles

Install:
NMM: Answer "No" and "Yes To All"
Manual: Copy all 3 files in Data/ and make sure the .esp is activated.

All credits go to: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6701093]carter641[/url]
author: Tiranno71
